Header.title: One bite is never enough
Header.paragraph: At Puff Lab, one bite is never enough—experience the perfect blend of flavor, quality, and heart in every cream puff!

About.paragraph: It all began with an entrepreneurship course, where our group of eight brainstormed business ideas. Among various suggestions, one member proposed Japanese cream puffs, which we eagerly pursued. The idea gained praise, and our lecturer encouraged us to take it further.Eventually, only two of us committed to continuing, later inviting a friend from accounting to join the team. We won several competitions and national awards. During the pandemic, we adapted by shifting to online sales.After two years, we opened a physical shop at Kuching and expanded our market by participating in events across Kuching-Samarahan. With our sights set high, we aim to take the business to the next level.
Why: The best crusted cream puff producer in Malaysia.
Supporting B40 students with job opportunities and delivering top-quality, unique cream puffs.
Provide financial aid to students through social entrepreneurship and build a strong, recognizable brand
Meet sales targets with highly demanded cream puffs.
Why2: We are now on Grab apps. No more depends on our COD days.
decorate your own cream puff topping as low as 20cents.
Ethe perfect treat for a special occasion

Services.name: Cookies and Cream
Services.text: Creamy, crumbled chocolate sandwich cookies into vanilla ice cream filling.

Services.name: Lotus Biscoff
Services.text: A surprisingly crunchy bite and a unique taste that is loved all over the world.

Services.name: Strawberry
Services.text: Get a big burst taste of sweetness of these plump and juicy red berries in your mouth.

Services.name: Soy Cheese
Services.text: Creamy and almost sweet, perfect for lactose intolerance and vegan buddy.

Services.name: Lemon
Services.text: Fresh, cheerful aroma and sourness of lemon is needed to brighten up your day.

Services.name: Matcha
Services.text: Emerald green color and a rich, vegetal taste of matcha from Japan as a filling of cream puff.

Testimonials.text: "The Japanese cream puffs are exceptionally delicious with a unique flavor that keeps customers coming back for more."
Testimonials.name: Delicious and Unique Flavor

Testimonials.text: "Puff Lab consistently delivers high-quality cream puffs that reflect their dedication to freshness and customer satisfaction."
Testimonials.name: Commitment to Quality

Testimonials.text: "The journey from a university project to a thriving business showcases the team’s impressive entrepreneurial spirit, resilience, and innovation."
Testimonials.name: Entrepreneurial Spirit

Testimonials.text: "Puff Lab mission to create job opportunities for B40 students is commendable, making it a business with a heart for community welfare."
Testimonials.name: Social Impact

Testimonials.text: "The tagline “One bite is never enough” is memorable and effectively conveys the irresistible appeal of the product."
Testimonials.name: Strong Brand Presence

Testimonials.text: "Ability to pivot to online sales during the pandemic and expand through events demonstrates adaptability and a strong commitment to growth."
Testimonials.name: Adaptability and Growth

Contact.address: Puff Lab PLT, LG, Bangunan HEPA, Universiti Malaysia Sarawak

Features.title: OUR VISION
Features.text: To be the best crusted cream puff producer in Malaysia.

Features.title: OUR MISSION
Features.text: To create loyal customers that love the uniqueness of our cream puff by ensuring best of quality.

Features.title: OUR GOAL
Features.text: To ensure that Puff Lab is easily recognized by everyone.

Features.title: OUR OBJECTIVE
Features.text: To achieve sales targeted at a certain period and produce cream puff that is highly demanded by customers.
